title: Emi dhOva balkumaa
sahitya:
Emi dOva balkumA ikanu nEnendu bOdu shrI rAma



anupallavi



rAmadAsuvale naitE sItAbhAma mandalincunu nItO tanak-



caraNam



daTTi gaTTi karamuna sharacApamu baTTi mUlavamula

    rAvaNu tala goTTi nilva nAvELa trimUrtulu gOri nutimpaga

naTTi

    vAri keduru balki rAjuku paTTi anaga nIku nAdupai daya buTTa

    kAraNambEmi delisE vara bhOgishayana tyAgarAjanuta tana
